#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long
#define sc(a) scanf("%lld", &a)
#define pr(a) printf("%lld\n", a)

using namespace std;

ll arr[100], ans[100];

int main()
{
	ll i,j,k,l,m,n,t,q;
	sc(t);
	while (t--) {
		sc(n);
		q=0;
		for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
			sc(arr[i]);
			q += arr[i];
		}
		q -= ((n*(n-1))/2);
		if (q%n == 0) {
			ans[0] = q/n;
			for (i = 1; i < n; i++) {
				ans[i] = ans[i-1]+1;
			}
			m = 0;
			for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
				ans[i] = arr[i]-ans[i];
				if (ans[i] > 0) {
					m += ans[i];
				}
			}
			cout << m << endl;
		}
		else {
			cout << "-1\n";
		}
	}

 	return 0;
}
